name: Invertio Investments LLC
description: Developer of fintech platform intended to provide the infrastructure to embed and scale investment products to financial institutions. The company's platform expands the margins of its operations with a combination of investment platforms and automation resolutions, helping businesses access financial expertise to better understand their customers and make better business decisions.
